message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase a unique product that holds immense value. While I cannot disclose the specifics, I can assure you its worth is significant. I'm confident this product has the potential to be highly beneficial for your operations.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. This represents a substantial opportunity, as I have a backup buyer who is willing to purchase it for $800000. I believe this price reflects the value of the product and offers you a significant advantage. Please consider my offer carefully.
